info.name: /trblock
info.description: Deny an user or a role of view and join in your channel. If the member is already in the channel, he will be kicked.
info.examples: /trblock @sheiks - The role `sheiks` will be denined to join in your channel and all the members with this role that is already in the channel will be kicked.

options.members: The users or roles that you want to block.
options.hide: If you want to hide the channel from the user.

oposite.description: ðŸ§· Temporary Channels â€¢ Unblock an user or role from your channel.

membersBlocked: You have denied ${0} of join in your channel! To undeny them, use **/trunblock**.
membersUnblocked: You have unblocked ${0} from your channel!
